page.title: 13Education
page.content: Cowdenbeath area has 3 primary schools and one secondary school. Two of the primary schools, Lumphinnans Primary and St Brides incorporate nurseries. Lumphinnans also has a special unit for children with behaviour problems. The children come from as far as Ballingry, Kincardine, Inverkeithing and Kirkcaldy. To enable them to learn social behaviour they are taken on outings and to parties. It also caters for handicapped children and has, at the moment, one deaf girl. There are 107 pupils in 5 classes. The nursery has 77 pupils and the unit has 7. There is a total of 8 teachers, with 2 in the unit.
